reviewText: Good push-up bra and still comfortable for nursing! A little tight in the waist though!

I was looking for a non underwire nursing bra that would also conceal my nipples and I thought this was perfect. It took a long time to come, but that was clearly stated as it came from overseas. The bra is well made and a great value for the price. It was far more padded than I expected, a little too much for my taste. The bra is extremely large. I ordered the medium which states it is a 75 (34). When it arrived, the bag said M, but the bra was labeled 36. This was way too big for me and not at all usable. I contacted the seller and was issued a partial refund. The customer service was good, but the size description has not been corrected in the listing.

While I could not use this bra, I gave it 4 stars because it's a great value. If you purchase this bra knowing that (and wanting) it is very thick padding, about an inch, and the medium is a 36, then you will be very happy with your purchase.
summary: Runs big, but well made for price.

Do you believe in magic? If you do then you are in the right place and if you don't you soon will. I have been wanting a new cell phone for probably around 5 weeks because of my job as a reviewer I come across things that require the newest android & blue tooth etc and as you can see by my video the camera is really lame as well so it's time for a new phone and I thought it sure would be nice to get a cell phone to review and everyday the thought goes through my mind, I even started a pitch letter to send to Samsung but, haven't sent it or pitched to any other sellers. Then 3 days ago when I finally got around to opening this package to see this cute little guy in there. I'm checking it out looking at the quality thinking wow this is really a nice score because I got a coupon for it at 100% savings. Anyway, just so happens I had this silver chain that was perfect for it..so I put it on and have kept it on day and night not really thinking anything about it, just cute..I wasn't thinking Talisman but, I'm pretty sure this one is a for real deal. because, after wanting a new cell phone so bad for more than a month, I received a request yesterday asking me if I would like to review an unlocked cell phone. Can you believe that? The other weird thing is the whole time I've been wearing it I have this feeling I am going to get rich. I never think like that and wearing it is an unconscious thing. I mean I wasn't putting any spiritual energy into it..not like with crystals or prayer. So now what? lol I am aware and taking notice I also dislike taking it off..is it coincidence? As far as the craftsmanship on this piece it's awesome and well worth the price tag they have on it. It's presented nicely in it's little box. I showed a picture of him to a couple of my Chinese friends and one said it was a Japanese fortune cat and then my other friend she said no it's Chinese and the symbol " is lucky, in the end neither one could remember the position of the paws saying one paw up was maybe Japan and two paws up like this guy is Chinese so I don't know gonna be a good question for me to ask. Either way you're gonna make yourself or someone else very happy with this little guy :) Peace!, ~Kiki

This lucky cat charm is absolutely breathtaking. It is made of genuine 925 sterling silver, this will not turn you green. The cat is adorable, and the detail of this is stunning. Red Swarovski crystals dot the bale which hangs on the bracelet, adding a touch of bling and sparkle without being overdone. Similarly, 2 clear Swarovski crystals dot underneath the cats paw. It is cute, but elegant, and is appropriate for jewelry wearers of all ages. The attention to detail is great, even the base on which the cat can stand up is detailed with ornate carvings. Red enamel adds to the detail. It is well made and heavy duty, this is not cheap costume stuff. I would say the quality here is on par with, if not better than the big brand name bracelet and charm companies. I have looked for similar designed lucky cat charms from the other companies, and I feel this one is the most aesthetically pleasing with so much detail. It is a heavy weight, and there is a lot of silver here, but it is not so heavy that it will weigh your bracelet down. It is also multi-functional. This charm is compatible with both Pandora style and Trollbeads style bracelets, and would fit other European style bracelets. It is also able to be worn as a pendant on a necklace. I even was able to wear it on a hoop earring, how cute would a pair of them be? This charm is great and I cant rave about it enough. It always makes me smile and I really enjoy wearing it, and I think you will too. I received this item for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: High quality and super detailed, stunning....

reviewText:
This is a great quality of jacket! It's a thin but soft material, and the designs look exactly as pictured. The jacket also came out of the package without that strong chemical smell you can get on your products sometimes.

As far as sizing US to Asian, I would pretty much say Only risk buying an Asian article of clothing if you're a US size Small or Medium. I am a female, 5'6'', and wear US Small. I've bought 2 Asian articles of clothing so far, both Asian Larges, and both have been perfect fits. My only wish is that the sleeves on this jacket would have been a good inch and a half longer; I like to have that warm, cute, slightly-oversized-jacket look. Overall, though, totally worth it! They'll look great at work with my light aqua scrubs.

I am tall but nat as tall as this suit.  The bottoms are attached to the top, but the attachment is a less expensive, flesh-colored material from just below the umbilicus to the empire waist.  The cups are not secured but will fold in half and shift when you take it off and it hangs to dry.  I love the length of the skirt that goes a few inches below the bottom panty-line, but it does float up since it is not attached in any way to the panty section, except at the empire waist. I love the empire waist because I have scoliosis and one hip is about 1 inch higher than the other.  This design helps camouflage that problem.  The adjustable straps didn't need any adjustment because they were in the exact place I needed them.

reviewText: I bought this t-shirt to commemorate the mathematically historic date. What I didn't expect was how soft and comfortable it would be. The shirt fits nicely, not too snug, not too baggy. Most t-shirts with large art images covering  the front are stiff and raised and sometimes plastic-smelling. Not this one. The image is crisp and clear without being raised or bumpy, keeping the shirt soft and comfy. It's also instantly evident that the shirt is well made and of good quality. I bought what I expected to be a novelty item, but I've become a fan of This Wear's quality.

I own one of every color, practically, & love them!  I've washed them again & again, hanging them up to dry, and they are like new, over a year later.  They are wonderful.  HOWEVER, I consider them an 'undershirt' to go under something looser and perhaps see-through or smaller.  I cannot recommend these as a stand-alone top/shirt.  As you see in the advertisements, they're form fitting.  Unless you're a super-model they're not flattering since they're skin-tight and no matter what your figure, they're immodest worn alone.  But with today's fashions, they are the perfect 'undershirt' to that cute tank, vest or off-the-shoulder sweater.  One size fits most, seriously.  Not for the obese.  I am 5'4" & 130 lbs. & it fits me fine. My daughter is 5'7" & 105 lbs. & it fits her similarly.

Next morning, watch was wound, time set, and worn until late evening. Noticed watch was about 20 minutes slow. Next day found that overnite the watch would completely stop just a few hours after I took it off and went to sleep. I kept using the watch and going this process for a couple weeks hoping for improvement, but watch would pretty much continue to stop and/or lose time. Wind never lasted a full day. After much dissappointment, was left with no choice but to return for refund.

reviewText: I love my new wallet! Has a lot of room on the inside for cards and cash. Only thing I would have liked is a zipper in back for my change.

So my girlfriend has been a long time fanatic about anything Sourpuss related. So for Christmas I decided to buy her this Bettie Page wallet. She is also a big fan of Bettie Page so this was 2 birds with 1 stone without a doubt. Excited and anxious for this to arrive, I waited by the front door so I could personally receive the delivery. After opening the packaging I looked at the wallet and had a huge smile on my face just knowing my girlfriends reaction is going to be priceless. Yet after giving it a "once around" I had noticed that there was some crooked and off-stitching and instantly my stomach felt like it was in my throat. After dreading giving my girlfriend the wallet, she was beyond stoked with it. She didn't even notice the blemish at first and when she did it didn't phase her one bit until it cane time to closing. She hates returning items, especially gifts, and when I told her I wanted to send that back she had gotten upset and showed me she could jerry-rigg it close to make it work. After seeing her get frustrated with it yet still not complaing, I took it upon myself to contact Sourpuss and see what I should do. After getting ahold of them, I was helped by a lady by the name of Libby and let me tell you she gained a lifelong customer with the way she helped me. She was very understanding and very easy to communicate with. Libby had expressed her extreme apology and sorry for the inconvenience. She had given me the option of having me send her some photos of the off set fabric stitched and assessed what she needed to help me and reimburse me with a brand new wallet with no hassle what so ever. Libby was amazing to deal with and again I will never have a second though, nor should you, about buying any Sourpuss product because I know that I am getting a quality item and if not I will be getting beyond amazing customer service. So I Dont see any reason for anyone to be unhappy in the end with the outstanding service and product. THANK YOU AGAIN LIBBY.

This scarf looks a lot cheaper than I expected based on the reviews. The fabric is thin, the dangling fringe looks a little silly, and the flower pattern is painted shimmery silver. It's not a stylish silver, nor does it add anything to the overall aesthetic apart from a screamed 'this was cheap'. I had to hoped to wear these scarves as mantillas to veiled mass as a part of my summer aesthetic - somber 50s Catholic housewife who is seriously tempted to strike up an affair with the pool boy or her best girlfriend to alleviate the tedium of her endless shopping/homemaking/shopping route.
Apart from the silver, the scarves just don't look very flattering on. The fabric hangs a bit weirdly around my face and the two pointed ends are way too long. I'll end up wearing them anyway because this is aesthetic on a budget and at $4 they are the only affordable option, but I wish they had left the silver fabric paint on a homemade homecoming t-shirt where it belongs.
summary: I had to hoped to wear these scarves as mantillas to veiled mass as a part of my summer aesthetic - somber 50s Catholic housewif

reviewText: Very pretty

What a great deal.  I bought it for use as a head scarf at the Traditional Latin Mass.
It was designed to be a scarf, and I must say that it is so attractive that I ended up using it for that, too!
I get comments all the time about it and everyone wants to know where I got it.  Some have actually followed through and bought their own b/c they liked it so much.
The shipping took a while from China, but it was worth the wait for the price and style.
It has sort of shimmery thread that as accents to the design which picks up the light but is not at all gawdy, so it is still simple enough for my intended purpose, while being very feminine and pretty.
It seems to appeal to a wide age range.  The young and cool have bought them and the older ladies also complimented it.  Of course the little girl in all of us likes the little dangles.
I'm surprised that it has held us very well, considering all the yanking my toddlers do to it.  It keeps the babies busy playing the with fringe and I can still keep it on my head at least half the time.
I guess that's the other factor if you are looking for a veil or headscarf - I have very slippery fine hair, but for some reason even though this feels like a fine material, it stays on very well.
I want other colors as a scarf, now, but the black is very attractive and fancies up a plain top very well.
summary: Veil or scarf, attractive for all ages, durable, unbeatable deal

Decided to take a chance and ordered one of these shirts. They come from China via China Post so it takes about a month to receive it. Normally I wear a Men's XXL size shirt from Ralph Lauren or Nautica. There is a Warning in the listing for these shirts that they run small by about one size. I found that in reality they run about 4 sizes too small. If you Order a XXXL you will get a Medium in USA size. That is before it is washed as it will shrink more no matter what you do or how you wash it. In other words if you wear a size Large or above in USA sizes these shirts will NOT fit you. If you are a small or a medium USA size order the XXXL for these shirts.  I ordered the largest size they had the XXXL and it was far too small. I am a six foot 2 inch man normal weight for my height and this XXXL shirt would not make it down to my belt line. Was far too tight to wear in the shoulders also and was just uncomfortable and tight to put on.  Total waste of money the XXXL size would not fit a normal sized American High School student let alone a grown man. If you are about 5 feet four inches tall the XXXL size might fit you. I am surprised Amazon is allowing these shirts to be sold in the USA the sizing is misleading and not suited for the US market!
summary: Buyer Beware Sizes are Abnormally Small!!

reviewText: This is very much a "get what you pay for" shirt. I actually bought it to use for a costume, and it did just fine. However, it was pretty small for the size I ordered and had a lot of loose threads, especially around the button holes as others have mentioned. I ended up returning it after Halloween as I couldn't see myself actually wearing it for anything other than that.

Paul Jones shirts are amazing. They fit better than anything I've found at Guess, Express, Macy's, Sears, Target, etc. If you're unsure, consider the price. It's worth it just to try one one. The styling is outstanding. My only complain, and it is very minor, is that the button-hole stitching tends to have loose threads that catch on the buttons. It happens on most of the shirts, but I've gotten used to it and am careful when unbutton. Given the outstanding fit and price, this isn't much of a caveat. I can't recommend these shirts enough!

Not too long and not too short. It is a very cute dress!!! The only thing I think the problem is that it doesn't have a size. I was looking for the tag on the dress that indicates the size, but I couldn't find it anywhere. I ordered US size 0-2, which is XS-SM, but I guess this is a one size fits all? I don't know. I just think the sizing is very confusing, and I think it's going to be hard to order other sizes if the dress itself doesn't indicate any size at all. Other than that, everything is great! Would love to purchase again.

This darling little Hot Number is sexy. I love mine, sure there are threads to snip off, that is no big deal. I have bought designer outfits that had the same issue, THREADS. I picked FIT AS EXPECTED because I had read the reviews on this top, which said they ordered a Lg and it was a small. That is right, It would be a size small if labeled for Americans but with feedback we can tell each other what fits who.

  When I first opened the package today, I thought it would be way too small for me, BUT I put it on it fits great AND I love it. The lacy fabric is nice and soft, not stiff, it does not scratch my skin. It does have a sheer modesty panel sewn inside and if you wear a white or better flesh tone bra you will look great or your bathing suit too. I am about 5', 34C, 125 LBs, fit as I exercise but a few lbs of padding and I am.a Mature woman who will Rock this top! Thank you Oh yes and the top is affordable compared to finding one in the mall. BTW Wash this cute top and everything like this by hand and let air dry. I wash most things on gentle or by hand and my clothes look great for years. Put them in the DRYER and clothes age prematurely. BTW It does not have any odor.

The only thing that I don't like is that there is no backing for the earring included, which means I have to go off looking for an appropriate backing for these earrings.  The wire is a bit thicker than usual, so this may take some time, however, it is not a deal breaker.  I keep several packages of different backings on hand; I just don't know if any of them will fit this wire.  Do yourself a favor when you purchase these, and get a package of ear backings to go with them.  They're not expensive and are made of silicone.  Aside from that, I love these beautiful earrings, and they will match what I intended to wear with them.  Enjoy!
summary: Beautiful Earrings Are Prettier Than Picture

reviewText:
I ordered this case being a big zeon fan. I really don't like the color of gold they chose for the insignia and had planned since purchase to repaint it and seal it myself. The item picture shows the colors it comes in perfectly.

The case fits well. There is a very visible seam around the sides where the 2 halves connect. The case is made out of low end plastic and has a fragile feel when it's in 2 pieces, but it feels more solid on the phone. It's coated in something to give it a rubbery finish and feel. If the phone is dropped the case usually pops off into 2 pieces, but my phone isn't often exposed to drops more then a foot or two. This case is not intended to be protective, it's purely for cosmetic purposes. All in all, I think it's great and I'm really happy with my purchase. This is my primary case that i use every day and have been for a few months

NICE DETAIL ON A LITTLE CHARM

Point being, they're too cheap for the price.

When I first received these earrings from STEELTIME, I instantly thought they were beautiful. I went with the white/silver set as they were the same exact colors I had originally worn back in 2009 for my sisters wedding and they were gorgeous. I figured I would go with that as they would match anything and everything I wore.

When it came time to put them in my ears, I got a little confused. I originally had the bigger pearl on the part of my ear that shows and the smaller pearl behind it. With how heavy the bigger pearl felt, I knew something had to be wrong. So I switched them around. After doing so, it didn't feel so weighed down anymore. I made sure to come back to Amazon and see if I had them in correctly, which I did. Beings it was my first time ever wearing earrings like this, that was to be expected. Haha.

At first I wasn't too crazy with how they looked in my ears. Normally I just wear studs and that is that. I wasn't too sure about the whole double look that these kind of earrings give off. After wearing them for a bit, I finally saw how unique they are.

Would I normally wear earrings like this? No, I wouldn't. If I hadn't received these to review, I'd probably just go get a regular pair of pearl earrings and call it a day. Because I had the opportunity to review these Stylish Double Sided Tribal Pearl Earrings I was able to see for myself the beauty in them. They aren't your normal pearl earrings and I can't seem to stress that enough. I would like to mention that if you aren't used to wearing heavy earrings in your ears, these will feel heavy until your ears get used to them.

These earrings are beautifully made and if I ever need a gift idea or another pair, I now know where to go to purchase them in the future.

*I received this product for review purposes. All opinions expressed here are 100% my own.

As a reference for other buyers, German size 34, 36, 38, 40 is equivalent to US size 4, 6, 8, 10 respectively, and this is not reflected in the size chart.  I had to mail this dirndl back to Germany for an exchange (mailing charge rather expensive even with USPS) at the end.  The seller was kind enough to offer a free exchange (free shipping) that would ease me on the burdening mailing/delivery charges between the US and Germany.

reviewText: Only major problem is that it picks up every piece of lint or animal hair within a 10 mile radius

I'm 5'6" 150# and fairly slim. I got the US medium (asian XL) and it fits me perfectly in the arms, shoulders and overall length from collar to bottom hem. The only area where fit isn't ideal is in the stomach/waist area. It's not that the fit is too tight or too loose, the feel is good. It's that when looking in the mirror that area just seems a bit baggier than the rest of the jacket. It's like the rest of the jacket was going for the slim look but the stomach/waist area was going for a more traditional look. Going around day to day it would probably wouldn't be noticeable, but when looking straight on in a mirror it shows. If I use my hand to cinch the back of the jacket some, it will get the more fitted profile I want. Hopefully a tailor will be able to do this for me since it's not worth returning for a smaller size as every other part of the jacket fits right.

The overall build quality of the jacket is great for the price. Seems solidly made and looks stylish. It is a perfect fall jacket that will keep you fairly warm and can accommodate some layers underneath. Just be mindful if you're looking for a true slim fit, the midsection may require some tailoring or maybe trying a smaller size than otherwise recommended (though I don't know if this would make arms and shoulders too short). I am overall happy with my purchase and might consider getting another color/style in the future.
summary: Good quality, good fit except for in midsection.

reviewText:
I have always loved jewelry. Even when I was younger I had a fascination with necklaces, bracelets and earrings. I think it is a part of every woman. It helps us to sparkle and shine. So I loved the sparkle to this necklace here and I couldn't believe that not only does it come with a necklace, but it also includes a nifty little piece of hardware. Or should I say, a fashion accessory for your hardware?

The necklace itself is very pretty. The chain is not as nice as I would like, you can just tell the quality isn't the greatest, but for the price it is a sweet gift. Perfect for teenagers or young adults and I think the fashion accessory it comes with would be a great fit for teenagers as well. If you own an iPod or iPad, you know how much dust gets in the headphone jack. Even with a case it still gets dirty. This set here comes with a plug to keep dirt and dust out! And it is a diamond charm! How cute is that? Needless to say, I enjoy the necklace and while I wouldn't mind keeping the diamond charm, it has disappeared into the iPod of my sister. Sweet set!

*Disclosure* I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. All thoughts are 100% mine.

This is a really cute fashion jewelry style pendant. The crystal gem catches the light and sparkles beautifully. I like the teardrop design and the cz stones in the setting, it sits very pretty in the 18in chain. The clasp is a traditional hook style and seems of average quality. I do like that it slides off without catching so I can switch the pendant easily if I want to use a shorter chain. I think the color is perfect for a preteen or teenage girl.

The cell phone dust protector bling is cute! It is not the same color of the necklace but that's ok. I actually received a green gem (my necklace is pink) and it fits perfectly in the aux port on my LG G4. It's a cute accessory. I'm thinking this will make an excellent stocking stuffer. The price is right and it will definitely bring a smile to her face. Five stars!

I did receive my Austrian crystal pendant and cell phone dust cover free or at a promotional price for testing and evaluation purposes. I was not paid for my revie and was asked only to provide whatever feedback I may have regarding the product. My review is solely based on my experience and honest opinions of this necklace.
summary: Sparkles in the light and really cute design. Would make a great stocking stuffer!

reviewText: Doesn't look like the picture advertised.

I love this pendant set. I have always been a fan of Austria Swarovski Crystals and this necklace is without exception. This necklace measures 18 in. which is average length. This necklace is beautiful and a sparkly red color; it's almost the shade of a ruby. It looks great whether you are dressed up or dressed down in jeans and t-shirt. I gave this necklace to my niece and she loves it. She said it was so sparkly and pretty.

This necklace is beautiful whether you wear it or give it as a gift for someone special in your life. I would recommend this necklace, I have another one from same company and it has still held up. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

reviewText:
I couldn't wait to write to let everyone know how very pretty this necklace is and wow, I love it. Its just the right size... not too small that you can't see it and not so large that it looks out of place. It is JUST RIGHT. :-)  I immediately put it on, didn't tell my husband but when he saw me he said, "That's beautiful. Where did you buy that?" I had to tell him I got it at a discount because he thought I had gone crazy buying such an expensive looking necklace. The extra bonus was the FREE Diamond Headphone Anti Dust plug for Cellphone. It fits perfectly and jazzes up my cell. I have a Razr and my husband has an iPod. It fits both...of course, he can't have mine. :-)

I was fortunate to receive this product at a promotional cost in exchange for my HONEST & UNBIASED opinion. I ALWAYS pretest every product prior to writing a review. I am free to write whatever I believe to be true, whether positive or negative. This is my true story and my honest opinion.

Bought these sharp-looking classic hiking boots after my beloved 15 year-old Birkenstock Footprint "Rockford" boots bit the dust (after one re-sole and numerous repairs over the years). I am very pleased with the vintage hiking style of these Hancock boots, the fit and classic cork/suede insole. The size and fit was just what you'd expect if you own any Birkenstocks. I wear a 9.5/10 in ladies with a slightly wide foot, and 41s are a perfect fit in these boots.
The customer service and speedy shipping was also amazing! My old boots fell apart on a Sunday, no longer repairable, I found these online on Monday, and they were on my Arizona front porch (shipped from Germany!) by Wednesday. Incredible. They have been easy to break in--the only stiff part was the area around my right ankle, but I've softened it up after a few hikes.
I look forward to many great years with these Hancock boots.

reviewText: Please never stop making this shoe!! Great fit and traction. Very comfortable since shoe has Birkenstock's corkbed soles. Very flat shoe. Doesn't add any height. Resembles a Converse shoe as far as looks are concerned , just a little wider in the ball of the foot.

This is the 2nd pair of Birkenstock shoes that my husband has purchased that do not contain a toe bar in the footbed. For regular Birkenstock sandals, like the Arizona, and other Birkenstock shoes that also have a toe bar in the footbed, like the Birkenstock Maine shoes, he wears a size 42 EU in a normal width. But when he buys Birkenstock shoes like these that have no toe bar in the footbed, he wears 1 size larger. So he got a size 43 EU in a normal width and they fit perfectly. The leather on these is so soft. The quality of the shoes are top notch, as all Birkenstocks are. The shoes came with a coat of neutral shoe polish on them. Using some Kiwi Neutral Shoe Polish, 1-1/8 oz on the shoes gave the same results as the wax from the factory, but don't use too much at all! My husband said that the excess gets stuck in the natural folds of the leather (created from walking in them) and then the wax stays stuck there, looking pretty white, and it makes the shoes look dirty. So a little neutral polish goes a *long* way. The bottom of the shoes are a gum rubber that seems to hold up well. He tends to drag the outer heels of his shoes, wearing this area down, but these have held up well, so far. The laces are just flat, waxed. Finding Birkenstock-specific replacement laces, though, has been difficult. (Ones that say "Birkenstock" on the ends, as the original laces do.) I'm sure that any aftermarket flat, waxed laces will do, though, but he's anal like that. Overall, he loves them and he would definitely buy these shoes again, if I let him! ;-)
Great shoes...Birky's always feel great.

Usually I wear a regular width in the Birkenstock Mayari. The copper color of these shoes only comes in narrow. I was worried that they would be too narrow, but they fit well after some breaking-in. The shoes were stiff at first but they broke in nicely. I LOVE them!
summary: The shoes were stiff at first but they broke in nicely. I LOVE them

reviewText: This boot was made for my feet! Fortunately, I was able to try it on at a local retailer, otherwise, I would not have gotten the correct size. It is only available in one width- M or wide. It is not as wide as my other Birkenstocks that are a medium width. I ordered the 38M and it fits the same as the Birkenstock Maine 37N. The boot is comfortable right out of the box. It does not have a toe bar, but it doesn't need one. It has the classic Birkenstock metatarsal support. Unlike other reviewers, I had no trouble getting the boot on. The insert lifts out, which is great because it can be used in other shoes and boots. I wanted the boot in Grey, but found that it is not available from US dealers. I took a chance and ordered it on Amazon from a shop in Germany. It came very quickly, and their communication was very good. I added Frye weatherproofing polish to help protect and maintain the good looks of the leather.

Now being a fan of Star Wars since I was 2, I've loved looking at the weapons of every single person in the film. This E-11 is one that caught my eye greatly. I had a version of this when I was young but it didn't look like this, which made it somewhat of a let down. It was one that made noise and had lights, but it didn't impress me. Now here I am years later and I found something that looks as identical to the Stormtrooper's standard as you can get. I really love the design, it fits in your hand, it's really compact and it's about as close to the blaster seen in the film as you can get unless you construct a custom version of it. Despite having no telescopic sight or foldable stock, I still really like it, even if it doesn't have sound or if it feels cheap.

reviewText: I ordered the wrong lenses (couldn't find the small B&L 5022 over the right lens), so I thought I was ordering the right thing.  When I checked with them to be sure, they told me to just return the package to sender and they would send me the right lenses for no extra charge.  They came as promised, and they fit perfectly.  It took a little more effort than I thought it would - both to get the old lenses out and to put the new ones in (I used the trick of heating the glasses in HOT tap water to expand the frames to get them out, still afraid I might break one of the original glass lenses and cut my hands, but no problems).  I'll just have to see how these polycarbonate lenses hold up - I really liked the old glass lenses until they got scratched.  And I'm not sure I ever had polarized sunglasses before.  Others are right - they really make smart phone displays dark, and one iPhone looks green in the vertical position and magenta in the horizontal, so if you don't care for that kind of funkiness, you might stick with the non-polarized version.  But I have to admit, they sure cut down on light reflecting off the pavement, and for the price, you could get both.  It's GREAT to have new scratch-free lenses in my old vintage American-made Ray-Bans, and at a FRACTION of the cost of the new ($200) Italian (polarized) version.  And these being American made lenses, it's that much better.  I've since ordered replacements for my Oakley Whiskers.  I know those will be easier to install since the frames screw apart.  DON'T THROW YOUR OLD SUNGLASSES AWAY WHEN THEY GET SCRATCHED AND DON'T HESITATE TO REPLACE THE LENSES.  THESE ARE A GREAT SOLUTION!!!
summary: I made a mistake...but they made it right

I started doing this bc I buy so many of my things from Amazon with my Prime membership and really depend on good reviews. I have written reviews for that reason without a discount. Its like getting a coupon to a clothing store and them asking you to review after you have worn the item. I can write this product SUCKS or this is great and either way I got the discount.

I have had this backpack for about 6 months now. I bought it with the intention of bringing it on trips and expected to last for a while. For the first couple of trips I brought it on, it was fine, but after that it just started to go downhill. The inside lining where the outside meets the inside began falling apart and the front pocket zipper snapped off completely, so I can't even put a paperclip on it as a quick fix. The zippers started to get stuck randomly even with nothing in the bag. It began deteriorating ~2 months into using it. Again, this bag was used for trips ONLY; otherwise it was not in use whatsoever. I never put anything heavier than a water bottle in the bag, but it is already falling apart on me.

Overall, it is a cute bag, but I do not recommend this as a long term backpack.

For looks, the watch is attractive. But I didn't buy it for looks alone--I actually expected it to keep time. It was quite amusing to find that the watch kept time just fine as long as I didn't wear it. But I bought a watch so I could wear it and know the time.
The night I got it I set the time and let it sit on my bed-side table. In the morning I was happy to see that the time still matched my phone's time. After wearing it for an hour it had lost 30 minutes.
I thought "Hmm... that's odd." So I set the time again and let it sit for a few hours. Again, it kept in step with my smartphone. I put it back on and within 10 hour it had lost 8 minutes.
summary: It should keep time when worn. But it didn't.

reviewText: Gorgeous shoe but way too small!  My heel was hanging off at least 1 full finger's width off the back.  In general all "Elite" shoes by "Corkys" run at least 1 size too small, but this particular pair ran 2 sizes too small.  I don't know if that was a fluke and they were accidentally missized, or if this particular style ("Torch") runs smaller than the rest?  Either way, they were so gorgeous I immediately contacted my friend who wears a size 9 and asked her to come check them out and see if they would fit her (I had ordered a size 11) and viola, they fit her perfectly!  I think a person who wears a 9.5 could've also fit into this size 11 shoe.  Very odd sizing.  (Btw, I've ordered 8 pairs of Corkys Elite shoes and only 2 styles were true to size, 5 more were at least 1 size too small and these were 2 sizes too small).  I say order at least 1 size larger than your normal size and you should be very happy with these GORGEOUS "hand painted" leather shoes!!!  The craftsmanship and detail on these shoes is phenomenal.  If they fit me, I would've never parted with them.
summary: Gorgeous shoe - runs small - order at least 1 size larger

This case for my Samsung Galazy s4 is great. I've had it for a little over 4 months now. It's made out of a slightly soft plastic that is strong enough to protect the phone from scratches and reduce the chance of screen cracks. The case protrudes about 2mm past the edge of the screen which is necessary for protection. The design on the phone is what I was initially attracted to, but when I saw it was only $2, I was sold. It's comparable to the cases that go for $10-$15. The only downside is that shipping took as long as they said it would (about 4 weeks). If I recall correctly, it came from Hong Kong, China. I'm in Maryland, USA.

Honestly I didn't expect this case to be of any good quality, especially because of the price. But I was pleasantly surprised when it came in. Despite the price and how cheap it looks, it actually does do a good job is protecting my phone, not to mention that the case is really cute.

reviewText: I originally purchased this shoe from Nordstrom a little over 2 years ago for my daughter in a size 7 which were to big for her.  I tried them on and they fit me perfectly. Nordstrom stopped  carrying these 2 years ago,  so I'm constantly looking on Amazon for this shoe. My husband works in law enforcement and tears up his boots.  If he gets 3-6 months out of a pair of boots he considers them tolerable.  Hes on his second pair after a year with the Solomons.  He says he will not wear a different pair as long as these are available.  Hes tried everything from Lowa, to Danner, to Nike.  These are not a speed tactical boot they are backpacking based so with vest, duty belt, and anything else he has to hump into the desert he says a backpacking boot with great support is what he needs.
summary: Pull the trigger! Youll be glad you did!

reviewText:
I have been a patrol deputy for 18 years. I am a fan of the Danners but was looking for something which weighed less and was still durable. I notice a few of my partners had these boots and liked them a lot. I believe a quality boot/ shoe is important as is a quality bed to help keep my body healthy. Anyways, I ordered these boots which was easy and fast as always through Amazon. The boots feel and look sturdy with good ankle support. My feet are comfortable inside and the boots did not require a break in. The sizing was accurate for my foot size. They are noticeably lighter than my Danners. I thought the locking eyelet was odd but it is actually helpful in getting proper tension on the laces.

I bought these in the winter. I have not stood in standing water but have walked in the rain and mud. I brushed them off with a carwash brush and put direct hose pressure on the boots. My feet never got wet. I have not slipped in the boots on wet terrain as well.

I have only had the boots two weeks so I cannot comment on the longevity but so far I am impressed with them. Hopefully management will continue to be lax with the shined toe requirement for patrol.
summary: I notice a few of my partners had these boots and liked them a lot

reviewText: These boots are awesome!!

I bought these about two years ago and use in an urban big city police environment. When I got the boots the sueade(sp?) appeared to be gray to me.  I used liquid black shoe dye and after it dried I hit it with some black shoe polish. Its not a gloss shine but meets department guidelines after.  I also hit the toe cap with edge dressing on occasion.  These boots are great with being waterproof and holding up to whatever Ive thrown at them.  The outsole wore quickly compared to Haix or Danner. The lace locks are nice and the laces that come with the boots have held up really well.  To clean these boots I go
To the bath tub and use a nylon scrub brush and everything comes off the outside has still held up.  Two years later they are completely waterproof.

I wear a 10.5 in brooks running shoes and the 10.5 in these boots fits me perfectly. I have maybe medium foot arches and an average foot width and have a neutral stride but I do tend to wear out the back outside bottom portion of both on whatever footwear I wear.

My only complaint is I wish I didn't have to dye the suede material black.  But. I just reordered and maybe its different. Everyone has been saying it looks green I say its gray maybe if you don't clean it every once in a while it would look nasty green idk.
summary: Great boot. Replaced after two years. Big City Police Use.

I loved those FUSE replacements I decided to replace a perfectly good pair of lenses in my Revo sunglasses and WOW.  I had lasik surgery over 10 years ago and driving was going to be an issue with glare etc that I have a special clear film on my car windows.  These lenses improve on that film that driving in bright sun is NEVER a problem.  They work so well that I need to peek above the sunglasses to read my phone.  I especially love the weight of these lenses!  The original lenses in my Revo were heavy and after hours of driving my nose would ache however these are perfect. The watch is cheap, of course, and feels like it. It feels very light and flimsy and the movement jiggles about when you set the time. That said, It seems solid enough and I'm not worried about it just falling apart. Just saying It's a $30 watch and it feels like a $30 watch.

It's listing as a girls watch is rather dubious, of course. The watch fits nicely enough, if not a little tight, around my 7" wrists. Every link is removable to adjust the size.

I'm pretty satisfied with the watch overall, now it's just a question of longevity.

These aren't "shoes" at all - they're traction devices which work AMAZINGLY to keep you from slipping and sliding on snow and ice.  I live in DC, where sidewalks are the last thing to get cleaned, and many of them are brick, so they get slippery even in rain, much less the snow and ice that we've had the last few years.  These helped tremendously in walking to and from the metro, walking my dog, etc., so I didn't fall down and break something fun or important.  Definitely worth the price, and I'm excited to have them for next winter!

So, I'm not even going to wear it until I do just that. Please, don't misunderstand my review; I LOVE THE DESIGN, THE COLOR & the fact that the beads have OM MANI PADME HUM written on them & the cute little elephant.....I don't want to chance losing every bead or the 2 little charms off this bracelet; and I'm afraid I'm going to if I wear it. So, until it's restrung, it stays in it's lovely little box. I suggest that the people at Cats Eye Jewels find a MUCH better way of stringing these incredibly beautiful beads. Thank You & Namaste.

reviewText:
The bracelet from Cat Eye Jewels is a beautiful, classy, substantial piece of jewelry that looks great. I received the "September" version of this piece, which includes a sapphire bead that dangles from the center setting. It really looks and feels great in person.

I like the bracelet that we received and would recommend this to anyone looking for unique, interesting and fun jewelry.  The 10mm silver beads sit around somewhat elastic monofilament that has some give to it, making it easy to slide this bracelet on & off over my wrist.

When laid flat on the table, the unstretched bracelet measures about 4 inches across (or 8 inches in total length) and it was an easy stretch to about 4.5 inches (9 inches total length). As mentioned, this thing weighs in at about 1.8 ounces per our postal scale, so it does feel and look substantial.

I lightly buffed the silver with a soft microfiber cloth, and it sparkles nicely under the light. The silver (described as silver plated base) and sapphire colors look outstanding together. There was no mention of a warranty that I found, so if an unexpected issue occurs within a reasonable period of time I would return to update the review and let you know what the issue was and how resolution was handled. I received this beautiful bracelet gratis from the seller and wore it to see how it looks and feels. My statements here reflect that testing and his sentiment.

If you are looking for a beautiful, substantial bracelet of this quality, construction, price, size and style, then I would recommend giving this piece from Cat Eye Jewels a try based on my experience with it.

Recommended.

Go for it.
summary: Tibetan Silver & Sapphire colored beads - About 8 inches long - One size fits all - Beautiful - Recommended

Very well made and fits my big melon perfectly. I live in the southwest and a summer hat is required to not have your head burst into flames. I have a couple hats but this is the best looking one by far. I like that it is fairly rigid and doesn't flop down in front of my eyes.

The draw string is an absolute must in the winds. This one is well done and works as you would expect.

Tip: Out of the box this hat was pretty darn misshapen. I sprayed it with some warm water and flattened it out by hand it was pretty responsive and looks a ton better.

Bottom Line: It fits perfect has decent ventilation and looks very good on. Love it!

reviewText: This is a very good looking hat for a man. Very manly hat,Australian looking. I like that it has sheer netting type material around the sides of the hat to catch breezes in the summer time. The material is of high quality it is made of ninety percent of polyester and ten percent nylon. Very easy to clean and it is a light weight material. The workmanship is very nice,I like the tie that is under the neck all you have to do is pull the toggle up or down to get your fit. It has already passed the mowing grass test and the gardening test. We are in the south and already getting temperatures in the high 70's and low 80's. Around here everyone needs to wear a hat. I like that it protects the back of your neck,that's usually where you get sun burnt the worse! I think is is very stylish,fashionable and also very protective of your face and neck. I highly recommend this hat to any man especially if you do  a lot of outside work. Thank you for the discount for my honest opinion.
summary: Good Looking Hat,Workmanship Is Perfect,Quality Light Weight Material's. Very Happy Customer!

Winter is coming and with no hair she is gonna need them ( mostly she goes without because this summer was so hot ). I just know she is gonna love them ( tempted to keep one cap myself ).  I purchased this at a reduced rate to review and can truly say they are a must have.

This hat was purchased for my daughter, because she looks amazing wearing a hat. It is listed as a hat for those who have hair loss, but she does not have that issue. The thing is, this hat is totally stying! I love the way it fits her, and it is wonderful for many reasons. The grosgrain ribbon can be utilized to tuck in accessories to match an outfit, a flower, a feather, a pin, and so on. Since she is a professional entertainer as well as an artist, she can use this hat to dress up an outfit that is used on stage. It is extremely well made. I think that if it were listed differently as something that is universal it would be more commonly worn, since it is adorable. No lie. Really cute! reviewText: For Fall or cooler weather. Attractive.
Very pretty and soft.

I received this as a gift from my mom. I have been working through alopecia areata.

The picture is not an accurate representation of the product. The color is not a bright burgundy, but a darker, dusty, muddled burgundy, which looks really awkward with the black trim in my opinion (very low contrast). On the model, the hat also looks like it has a bit of structure. On me it looked frumpy. It is a lightweight unstructured knit. It might be comfortable to some, but is much less fashionable in person. I thought it made me look too much like an ill patient.

The return process was also not as smooth as others I have had on Amazon. We ended up having to pay shipping to return, even though the product was represented differently than the reality.

On a positive note: the packaging was beautiful, and done with much care. This seems like a great family business to support; but definitely not the right product for me personally.

Totally happy with this hat. It looks just as good on my wife as the photo of the model. She hates hats and was avoiding shopping for one even though her hair was falling out due to the chemo treatment. She loves this one I picked out for her. I was a little confused by the size chart because there didn't appear any way to select a size. The hat has no size marking in it so it appears to be one size fits all. It is slightly large for my wife's head but fits okay anyway. From the photos it appeared to be made from velour but is actually constructed of two layers of cotton knit similar to tee shirt material. The corduroy-like trim around the edge really makes the hat stand out.  My wife is an expert seamstress and she commented on how well made it is. I was impressed with the presentation; it was carefully wrapped in issue paper on a cardboard backing with a pretty refrigerator magnet on top.

Update: It's been eight months since I ordered this for my wife. I also purchased the burgundy one. The burgundy color is much muted compared to the photo in the ad and looks much better because of. Over the course of the chemo my wife has acquired a selection of hats and head coverings and these two are still her favorites.
Feel pretty when wearing it.  Love it

reviewText:
I've had my pair of Romer II glasses for a while, with the red mirror, clear and grey lenses. I had wanted a set of amber/brown polarized lenses for a while to wear fishing, so I ordered a set of these in hopes that it would fulfill the purpose.

The lenses went in soft and a bit loose, but seemed to catch.  I wore them down to the lake and the polarization was fine, as was the color.  The issue was the fit.  The lenses appear to be a fraction too small.  Slightly bumping the frame or taking the glasses off would result in one or both of the lenses popping out.

As much as I would have loved for these to have worked out (and would have ordered another set in the grey polarized), these don't stay put.  I am not going to glue them in, when a major benefit of the glasses is the ability to exchange lenses to meet the situation.

This hat was purchased as a gift for a friend who has lost her hair while undergoing chemotherapy. It is supremely soft and very attractive. He head is of average size and the hat fits perfectly. It sits low enough on her head that her baldness is fully covered. She loves it!

The hat is beautiful. It's well made out of really soft fleece and will be nice and warm this winter. The hat was beautifully packaged with a ribbon and a magnet -- even the invoice was in a nice sleeve. The shipping was super speedy as well. Wonderful!
Nice quality product and will come in very useful in cold PA winter.
Awesome for workouts. Great purchase.

I am totally satisfied with the scarf pad.  It does everything it says it will!  Makes me feel more confident to wear my scarves and hats.  I feel like I have something up there now and my scarves and hats don't slip off.  I am totally satisfied!
summary: I feel more confident with this under my scarves, and hats!

reviewText: The fit is great and very comfortable!

I can't believe I ever imagined wearing a hat or a scarf without this amazing liner. It makes a difference not just on grip, but especially on moderating my temperature during this month when my hair went "flying with the wind" due to chemo; the liner made all the difference. It's well crafted, with a 'breathing hole at the crown, and is easy to fold and tuck into a purse for extra insulation when the temperature changes. It's also so easy to wash. From a style perspective, I love that it "fills out" many of my chemo caps and hats and caps, giving a sturdy foundation, and making my scarves look as though they have a full head of hair underneath.  I need another!
summary: My 24-hour must-have every day: Multi-purpose Scarf Pad and Liner is also fabulous Style asset for hats

reviewText:
This is amazing.  It really works.  Scarfs, hats, & beanies all stay put, even if you have no hair.  The soft inner side will not scratch or irritate a bald head.  Fits comfortably.  Place it on the crown of the head, then a head covering of your choice.  You will appreciate that this item keeps your head covering stay.

All that said, I have not tried it in the wind.  With the Fall upon us and Winter around the corner, the windy season is here.

***I received a discount on this product or received it for free in exchange for an unbiased, honest review based on experience with this item**
summary: If you are losing your hair, and want to wear a head covering, get this item first to keep your hat on

reviewText: Good fit, soft and comfy.  One small tag inside that was easily removed without having to repair the seam.  Other caps have tags sewn along the seam so when the tag is removed some sewing is necessary to repair the seam.  I don't understand why they put tags inside these caps.  Generally they are used by bald chemo patients like myself and tags are irritating to a tender scalp.  Even though this cap had one tag I was happy not to have to sew it back up after removing the tag.  I would order another.
to be truthful I have not had to use this yet so I cannot give a fair review. It does appear to be well made.
Soft, warm, and comfortable for my wife. She loves it.
Ahh... new lenses
In such a stressing time this hat doesn't make you feel self conscious when outside, thank you for that.

does not fit correctly to the frame, due to the incorrect size, its obviously not easy to install. as the original glass. The polarization is very minimal where it dos not really effect and glares. Whether you are driving a boat in the ocean or a car on the road of  Florida weather you really need Polarisation from the glare of the sun. When driving on the road it can rain and then be sunny causing a l ot of bright glares.

I have tried calling the company to see if i could get the correct cut  or get one thats actually polarised. so far I have not heard back from them

I gave two stars for the fact that the lens itself is very nice, its a lot more clear than the original ones my arnette came with. its also a bit lighter. You cant feel as much, but it does the job. also the product did arrive early then expected for those reasons I gave it a 2.  If the company calls me back and gives me the correct lenses I would def bump the stars to 5..

I use these headwraps because of a condition I have. I like them well enough. They are pretty and last for years. I wish they were less expensive. I did find that they were less expensive when purchasing directly from the company...even when adding in the shipping cost on the site.
Pretty cheap looking.

This hat is absolutely adorable!
If you need a hat that looks stylish but covers the head well, I would recommend looking into this one. This would be a great hat for someone who is going through treatment and loosing hair, because it covers the head very well, is very cute, and still cute to wear after your hair grows back. It would even work for someone with a full head of hair and needing some head coverage.

I bought the beige hat and love the color and design of the hat. The hat has a solid under material of tan, and the top material has a design lines that somewhat resemble zebra stripes mixed with a few short stripe designs here and there, of both solid and sheer material that shows through to the underside material. Then there are little sequins all around that shimmer different colors like blue, green, orange, etc.

The size inside on the tag says it is 57 cm, it fits both my daughter great. We are able to pull it down over our ears and cover everything, or let it sit higher and look more like a newsies hat.

Loosing hair can be especially hard for women and young girls, we put so much emphasis on our looks and a lot of that is on our hair. reviewText: Too small and not white.

I was looking for a staple skater skirt to pair with small tops for *hot* summer days. I wanted a billowy skirt to make the look cute and sexy more so than erring toward trashy, like if paired with short shorts.

The waistband was slightly snugger than expected, but not bothersomely so. Hem longer than expected - but again, no big deal.

Material wasn't as expected. Polyester and kind of rough, but not uncomfortable. Hoping it will be breathable on hot days.

Skirt is very cute. The reason for the 4 star reviews is because it is see through. Definitely plan to wear a slip under this. I was bummed about this initially, but then I realized I always wear bike shorts under skirts like this anyway, so I suppose a slip isn't a big deal.

Even with a slip, you can still see the curve of my legs and booty if you're staring. See in the first picture how when I pull the skirt to the side, you can still see the slit of my slip. But just glancing at it, or if the lighting is dim, it will be fine with a slip - which is what I'm banking on.

Let me start by saying this: I live in skirts, and it is unfortunately very hard to find decently priced, nice fitting basic skater skirts. Patterned? No problem. Short? No problem. But it seemed like everywhere I looked - there were no cheap options for me.

I decided to take the plunge and try shopping online for skirts about a year ago - which was a big deal for me, because I am very pear shaped. It's hard to shop online because I can never tell if it'll be flattering due to my hip:waist ratio.

Well I'm glad I did. These skirts are amazing. They fit well, with just enough flexibility to be comfortable, while also having enough elasticity that they have no trouble staying in place. They are made from quality material. The colors are true to the picture. They are very flattering, on most body types. My girlfriend is very square shaped, with a tummy - looks great! I have ridiculously wide hips, with little to no tummy - also very flattering!

They are long enough that I am able to hike them up to my boobs if I'm feeling a little cheeky (though keep in mind I am 5'3), yet also offer some sense of decency and covers down to my knees if worn at my waistline.

So why the four stars?

I've bought four of these skirts over the past year. Each one has been different. I have two black skirts (one for me, the other for my girlfriend) and the material feels different (though maybe that can be due to the fact that they had been bought about a year apart?). I also have a red one, which is a LOT thinner than the black version, and lays slightly less "fruffy" (for lack of a better word) around my hips (no complaints here, though). The most recent one I bought, the white, was also a LOT more see-through than the others. (Looks like I'll be investing in more white undies...) Which is, I suppose, what I should expect from the picture. But no less disappointing seeing as I absolutely love these skirts.

All in all these skirts are a great investment, and I definitely plan on buying all color variations with time. Just be aware that there might be some difference in make between one skirt to the next.

Or who knows, maybe I just got a weird batch.

reviewText:
I got this watch for my husband because I thought it was a really nice design that is pretty unique. He thought so too! It looks great and goes well with many outfits. He also likes the bracelet it comes with. The design of the bracelet is done in a masculine way, in fact, I wanted to wear it but it didn't look right on my dainty wrist! The watch also functions perfectly and is made with durable, high quality materials. It comes packaged really nicely in a box making it easy to present as a gift which I believe any man would love.

**I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review**
Great watch

This is a nice watch for a gift or those on a budget. It looks classy and is well-made considering all of it's good points. It came packed on a pillow in a hinged gift box along with a magnet clasp bracelet. This is a simple watch to set. Remove the plastic clip behind the crown, set watch, that's it. Simplicity! Now remember the chronograph is a cosmetic touch, NOT a function of the watch. The straps are of a brushed leather-like material with a black accent over the holes in the strap. The bracelet looks good and the magnet is very strong. A decent watch.
A couple things I didn't care for. The bracelet will only fit guys with small wrists. I have small wrists and this barely fit me! The loop for the strap is sewn in and is not adjustable so I had to really bend the end of the strap to fit it in. I supposed you could avoid it and use the second adjustable loop instead. I received a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

Such a pretty veil. There is no reason to go out and spend a lot of money on a veil when this one is gorgeous and you can get it for a decent price.
The veil is 2-tiered and looks so pretty on. Obviously, I'm not getting married again so we chose to use this as a costume piece but I can honestly see using it for a real wedding or at the very least at the bachelorette party.
The edge is done all the way around with a pretty satin border. It is well sewn and is quality made. The comb holds the veil in place without any issues at all. Once in it stayed there for the evening.
The veil fell to my elbow. It is around 24 inches from the comb to the upper layer and 31 inches from the comb to the lower seam.
I received this in exchange for providing my honest opinion and never guarantee a certain rating.

Bonus, the veil comes in either white or off white color.

In fact, I bought it not for my wedding, it for my living show. The price is perfectly and the quality is good. The customer service was patiently with my answer and rapidly ship it out as my specoal request.

Love this bag. It is very sturdy and well-made. The leather bottom means it won't get dirty as quickly and will hold up longer. The canvas is a thick and tightly woven fabric. My Macbook Pro fit with room for all my other essentials. My oversize Toshiba didn't, but it doesn't fit in anything so wasn't expecting it to. Straps feel very sturdy and are easily adjustable. Alas, I must return it. It's just too big for my petite (i.e. very short) size to carry it off - it looked like I was carrying a suitcase. This is not a flaw in bag design, just my size. If you are average height or above, I highly recommend this bag. I'm settling for my second choice, the Gootium 30825, which is also a very nice, and smaller, bag. It doesn't hold as much, but it does look more size appropriate on me.

I love this dress which is what it looks to be when I wore it instead of a shirt as the title states. I ordered the size large but it fits me like an Extra Extra large so I recommend ordering at least one size down. The material is really soft but not clingy. The back is much longer than the front. It is oversized on me which is a really good look on my frame. I have worn this with leggings and boots and I received endless compliments all evening on how great I looked. The slits add sex appeal and are pretty high up on the legs especially for those who are a bit taller than I am. If you want to look more appropriate, you can choose to wear this dress/shirt with jeans or leggings.

For reference, I am curvy fit, 34DD chest, 5'5, 160 pounds. (Sleeves are pretty wide, exactly as pictured) I would recommend this for anyone especially if you enjoy wearing leggings in the fall/ winter!

I do love this brand which I had originally purchased through Figleaves in the UK.  And these are definitely UK sizes, which I thought would be transferred to US, but they are not.  Thus, if you are a D cup, you will need to order a C cup instead.  The banding size is exactly the same.  These are made for larger cup sizes, so if you are average or smaller, I am not sure if the fit would be as spot on.  I have just reordered this down a cup and hope it to fit perfectly like my last bikini top.  Not important, but size it states I ordered, I did not, so don't compare that to my review for fit.  And I like the way it is more thickly lined.  No, it's not padded, but molded.  When getting in or out of the pool wet and cold, it won't show.

reviewerName: The Happy Clown With A Frown
reviewText:
I love these lightweight sunglasses! I realize the large style might not be everyone's cup of tea, but I really like these. I received the i-Design Purple Metal Sunglasses at no cost to review and I love that they are so light! They don't dig into my nose or hurt my ears. I chose the purple frames and I am am thrilled with the choice. I normally don't care for large lenses but I like these. I wear regular glasses and only wear my contacts once in awhile. I love that these sunglasses fit over my regular glasses. When the sun is burning out my retina, I don't even care if it looks dorky.

The metal is thin and has lots of flex in it. I don't think of it as flimsy though because they have quite a lot of give without breaking. It allows the arms and frame to flex to fit faces of different widths. The flexibility also allows them to sit comfortably without the clamping pressure some glasses can cause. I like the screw free design of the arms because for me, that is usually a weak point in glasses. Those little hinges end up bent  , broke or the screws fall out. At any given time, we have a couple of one-armed glasses or sunglasses laying around. The screwless hinges on these create a more solid connection between the front and the arm. These definitely feel different if you used to the thicker heavier plastic sunglasses. The first time I wore them I was unsure, but it didn't take long to get over it. They stop the sun from burning my eyes, stop me from squinting in bright light and are comfortable to wear.

These come with a microfiber drawstring bag as well as a square semi-hard box to store them in. I use both. I keep them in the bag to keep the lenses clean and then place them inside the box for breakage protection. You also get a microfiber cloth for cleaning the lenses. If you just prefer the smaller lenses, you might not like these. I didn't care for larger lenses myself, but since trying these out, they are my favorites now. I have been completely satisfied with these sunglasses.
Perfection and stylish ice worn them once and the compliments were nonstop. Well made, unique design and impressive packaging. I will look for this brand in the future

Wow, my Dollar Store shades are like Chanel compared to these! They're super thin, feel super flimsy, and sit so high on my face they make my nose look huge. I super don't get all the 5 star ratings, these are bad! The design is super cute, I'll give them that, but everything else from teh hinges to the nose piece to the general materials are just cheap, poorly designed, and flimsy.

I received these free for reviewing purposes. All opinions are my own

These glasses are interesting to look at and very light weight - the thing that gives them 3 stars only is the fact that they let the sun in from the sides - top and bottom of the frames - My regular sunglasses block the sun from the sides well, but these sit off of my face in such a way that the sun shines in around the frames -

The frames are light weight and interesting to look at with the cut outs, but they stick out on the sides away from my face and they do not block the sun - the reason I wear sunglasses in the 1st place - I took these with me in vacation, but they do not block the sun from my eyes.

These sunglasses are fun to look at and light to wear that they feel like nothing on your face, but the sun gets around the frames = this could be from the shape of my face -
summary: Pretty look- light weight like nothing at all - but not a good shape for my face/

reviewText:
Pros: Well-made, multiple ways to protect provided, stylish
Cons: none

I ordered these sunglasses to add a unique flair to my collection and was not disappointed.

The  i-Design Screw Free Womens gradient sunglasses arrived quickly and are super well made. As stated in the product description these are screw-free sunglasses. While  that usually causes design flaws, none could be found in these stylish and unique frames (see attached photos for screw free nose pads and temples) . I love the light weight, the high-low detail on the corners of the lenses and the subtle gradient lenses.

I have a round face that makes finding sunglasses a tad difficult, but the style of these would look great on any face shape. And as a random side note: I wear thin framed small lensed glasses when I am not wearing my contacts. In my rush one day I forgot I had my glasses on, and through these sunglasses right on top. Funny enough, they fit! They covered my glasses completely and no one but me realized what I had done.

These glasses come in soft drawstring bag to protect the lenses, and then that bag comes in a rectangular hard glasses case. This double layer of protection keeps your glasses extremely safe when not being worn. A cleaning cloth was also provided.

Overall: Stylish sunglasses that I won't hesitate to purchase again in different colors.

reviewText: Fascinator arrived well packaged and in a timely manner.  Very well constructed, fits comfortably on the head, and looks great on me.  Comes with original tag of "Something Special - Commerce, California," style number YH2501 and another tag that says it's 100% sinamay without trimming.  The reason why I gave this four stars instead of five is that the one I got though is more lavender/purple than the Barbie pink in the stock photos with the orchids and feathers also being more of the orchid/violet/amethyst hue which is unfortunate as I bought this with the intention of wearing it to Red Hat Society functions as a pink hatter.  Overall, a beautiful fascinator which I'm sure to wear anyways for tea parties and for funsies, but don't expect the "orchid" one to be pink like in the picture.  Honestly though, I would buy again because it is well constructed and a beautiful piece for the price I had paid.  So if you are looking for an orchid colored fascinator of the violet/orchid/amethyst/lavender hues, this is the fascinator for you!
summary: So pretty!  Just be warned that the "orchid" option is actually orchid in color than the pink color in the stock photos.

reviewText: I purchased this turquoise fascinator for my octogenarian mother for her to wear to the Pennsylvania Derby on Saturday, September 24, 2016.  She looked beautiful in the fascinator and it complemented her navy blue dress with turquoise and pink embroidery accents.  Regrettably,  she has dementia and before we arrived at the Parx Racetrack she tore the fascinator off and tossed it into the backseat of the car. Because I believed this would likely be the last event we attended together,  I purchased this fascinator in purple/magenta and I wore it and received many complements.  I will most likely purchase this fascinator in black/white to add to my collection.
summary: Perfect for a day at the races.

reviewText: I'm a 34C and these fit perfectly. Very comfortable.

I had been searching and searching, for the last 6 months or so, to find a bra that fits well. Finally I found one that is comfortable, fits well, and is really affordable.
 After breastfeeding two children, I'm not the same size and shape anymore. I tried different brands, different sizes, and was never totally happy with how the bras fit and felt on me. I was starting to feel like I would never fit into a bra comfortably again! After reading the reviews for this bra I thought I would give it a try and I'm so glad I did.
It's made out of materials similar to a sports bra but doesn't create a weird shape like most sports bras do.
I can't say how long these bras will hold up through regular washing but so far no issues there (it's only been about a week since I got them). Either way, I'd still say for me it is totally worth it to have something comfortable that actually fits and looks good. They are relatively inexpensive, which I like! I plan to get some more in different colors.
Oh, and it has adjustable and convertible (in the back) straps!
I also want to add, as others have stated, this bra most likely wouldn't work well for someone with a large cup size, and be aware that they are "one size fits all".
summary: Finally, a comfortable bra that fits well!!!

The length is a wonderful, flirty, mid thigh length (maybe even a tiny bit shorter, I am 5'4") but the bust area is incredibly small. And when I say incredibly... I mean WOW! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this dress! I purchased this dress for my Daughter's 50's Theme Wedding, which was held on the 4th of July in the U.S.A.  My Daughter, the Bride, as well as all the girls in the wedding party, wore swing style dresses with red petticoats underneath.  So, I also purchased a red petticoat to go with my dress! Compliments, compliments, compliments! This dress is so well made and the material is so comfortable.  I fell in love with it when I saw it online because the style and colors are so perfect for the occasion.  I have to admit I was uncertain about taking the risk of ordering it, BUT, I'm extremely glad I did!  My only advise is to make sure you measure yourself properly, as shown, and don't worry about what the size says.....go by the measurements.  I usually take a size 10 US size or Medium/Small US size, and I had to order a Large to match my measurements, even though that seemed wrong! My dress fit like a glove!

Do an internet search. You'll find these earrings available at a couple of low priced retailers for about the same price. Then you can see in person what they look like. I didn't do it that way. I just ordered them from Amazon.

The type earrings I 'needed' ~YKWIM~ to match a gorgeous real topaz and diamond pendant I own are at this time out of my price range. After finding these on the Bay and on Amazon, I ordered them here.

Read the description here carefully. The jackets *are* gold plated sterling silver. The little CZs sparkle and appear securely set. I'm uncertain how good the gold plating is. Time will tell.  To my eyes, at least one of the the jackets I received is out of round. But not severely. It appears the craftsmanship is about what one might expect at this price point.

Read the description carefully for the topaz earrings. The earrings are separate from the jackest. There is no description of the setting for the topaz earring setting securing the stone. The blue topaz stones are a deeply saturated Swiss blue. They are set in those cheap brassy thin jeweler's metals with a flat bottom and four sharp edged 'claw prongs'. The posts are about 2 mm shorter than posts on most modern earrings. The butterfly backs are teensy, but fit tight.  This is what we used to call a dime store type setting.

For me the blue topaz studs won't be wearable on any frequent basis because that tinny metal irritates my pierced ears. (And the posts are too short.) Maybe one day in the future I'll get a jeweler to set the stones in silver (vermeil) of standard quality. I'll being along the jackets if they last.

I tried the jackets with my real .90 carat (each) diamond studs set in a solid tulip setting. No fit at all.

Finally, I tried these jackets with a nice pair of good quality .50 carat (each) CZs set in a 6 pronged vermeil setting. Bingo! These jackets gave a nice halo effect to the bare CZs. Perfect fit.  Otherwise, these would be going back to the seller.

reviewText:
GloFX Glasses
Your distorting perfection
Forever I'm taken

I literally did not mean to order these. In fact, I already have a pair. BUT I'M KEEPING THEM.

Just screwing around, I must've hit "one click" and accidentally ordered this pair of glasses. I only knew when I received an email from Amazon telling me they'd just shipped. I considered cancelling, but it was too late for that.

So I figured I'd just return them after they arrived- prime, right? But obviously I had to try them first. When guests show up at my home, I don't just turn them away cold and alone into the night- I put them directly on my face.

No. Once I put these bad boys on, they would not be removed by hell or high water.

They're now a permanent fixture and my old flatback standard ones will be passed down to another serendipitously fortunate dancer. Stay classy, my friends, and get you some of these glasses. You won't regret it.

(They do rub eyelashes a bit due to the protrusion on the eye side. No big. Also, sure, they're a *bit* heavy, but I didn't find them unworkable or too much to keep on.)

Get you some.
summary: Total Accident. Keeping them anyway. They're that awesome.

reviewText:
I ordered the black/gray/pink headbands and really like the stretchiness, fabric, and size.  I folded mine over so that it's not too wide and it works well.

I would have given it five stars, but it doesn't work very well when I wear my glasses.  I put on the headband first, but when I put my glasses on, it made it too tight in front of my ear and I had to push the headband back further on my hair, not closer to my face at my hairline where I wanted to wear the headband.  Because it was further back, the headband did slip back eventually by the end of my workout - but it worked much better than other headbands I've tried.  If I had been able to wear it at my hairline, I'm sure it would have stayed put just fine.

So if you wear glasses when you work out, just be aware that you may have to adjust where headband rests on your head.

It's not really the fault of this particular headband - probably any headband would so the same thing.
summary: Love the headbands, but wearing glasses may affect where headband sits on your head

reviewText:
I love these sport headbands! I actually plan on wearing this under my riding helmet, this is perfect for making sure sweat doesn't drip down.

Unfortunately, when you're riding a horse, it's not like you can carry a fan with you... :-) and because its getting really hot, since I live in Florida, it would be really nice to have something to help keep the sweat from my eyeballs.

These are perfect because they are really nice cotton and they are stretchy. So I can actually put them around my head the way that I want to, which I will put half on my forehead to catch the sweat and then the other half will be on the top of my head.

I love the pink, it is really bright and of course my favorite color! The Black is perfect because it'll blend in with my riding helmet, and the grey will be used on the days that I just don't feel like doing laundry!

I am absolutely pleased and happy with this purchase! I might need to buy another set just because I might want one to match every single color of my riding pants!

This is also really nice for my curly hair because I hate when my hair gets really really matted down from my helmet! Because then it always gets knotted because of the material that's inside of my helmet that gets pressed on my head just in case I fall off the horse, I know it's for safety, but it really sucks when you have curly hair. This will actually save my hair from getting caught in that and I don't have to worry so much about getting knots in my hair!

I am very highly recommend this product!

I recieved this product at a discounted rate for an honest review.

Overall I'm happy to find affordable, cute nursing tops and am glad to have this and another of a different color in my wardrobe.
